name: Specshong
description:
It is currently in the development phase

Everything works to the rhythm of the music

A musical rhythm game where you will have to dodge obstacles or break some of them until the music ends

-Support for
  • MP3
  • OGG
-Minimum requirements
  • 1GB Ram
  • 350MB VRam
  • 0.53 TFLOPS
  • Screen with minimum HD resolution
